key_risk_themes: ["Third-Party API Instability (GSP, GPS)","Cloud Infrastructure & Deployment Complexity (AWS EKS)","Go-Live Execution Risk (Data Migration, Phased Rollout)"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Schedule and execute a technical spike for the GSP API integration to validate its stability and documentation.","Mandate peer reviews for all Terraform and Kubernetes configuration changes to mitigate deployment risks.","Secure a full, anonymized data dump from the legacy system to begin data mapping and cleansing analysis immediately."]
